params.about_text: Hi my name is Keyur Khunadiya and I want to become Python Developer. I am studing Bachelor of Engineering in Information Technology from G H PATEL COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING & TECHNOLOGY.I am currently searching internship in Python development.I have created this website using flask framework.Hope that you will like this programming blog website.You can add your blogs and edit/delete after adding the blog whenever you required.If you have any query then contact me.I will surely reply to you.
